description: A multi-agent system that extracts intent from input and schedules meetings.

secrets.description: Used to interact with the user's calendar

agents.name: intent_parser
agents.description: Parses user input to extract time, participants, and topic.

agents.name: availability_checker
agents.description: Checks calendar for available time slots.

agents.name: scheduler
agents.description: Schedules the meeting using calendar APIs.
